Content.Text:
<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R><NAME_UNKNOWN>Ooooh, now there's a face I haven't seen before.
And who might you be?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R><NAME_UNKNOWN>Ah, so you're the new farmer. You fit Veronica's
description to a T.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>But ah, where are my manners? I am <BLUE>Giorgio</BLUE>. I
run a small farm just north of town.
<PAGE>
You've seen me in all the magazines, I'm sure.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Wh-what...? You haven't? Alas, perhaps my
fame is still a bud, yet to fully burst forth upon
the world.
<PAGE>
Well then. I suppose I'll just have to sweat that
much more to make it bloom.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Oh dear! I've taken leave of my manners again,
losing myself to my ponderings.
<PAGE>
My name isn't unknown in farming circles. I've
even appeared in a magazine or two, no doubt
to show the glamour of the farming lifestyle.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Oh, it's not as big as it sounds. You're going to
work on your farm as well, right?
<PAGE>
If you ever have any trouble, you come straight
to me, okay? I'll help as only I can, from my
deep storehouses of beneficence.
<PAGE>
My neighbor is a fellow farmer named Fritz. I live
to the east of him. Now then, I must be going.
<PAGE>
Good night.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, my! Hello there, <BLUE>Giorgio</BLUE>. Back home from
your trip already?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Indeed. I just got back, so I thought I'd stop by
and say hello.
<PAGE>
And this is?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is <MYNAME>, the new farmer who just
moved into town.
<PAGE>
We'll soon be covering all the basics of farming.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Aaaaah, I see.
<PAGE>
I'm Giorgio. I run a small farm north of town.
You've seen me in all the magazines, I'm sure.
